issue.title: [C++] Add File Handling Test cases for GlobFile handling in Substrait Read
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17640](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17640). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At the moment the `GlobFiles` function hasn't been tested with an end-to-end Substrait-To-Arrow case. Also observed that leading slash is ignored in this API. Proposed changes are adding test cases to cover the fix including end-to-end test cases.
